item.title: AGI Research in HDILab
item.description: Hello, My name is Deokgun Park and I lead Human Data Interaction Lab (HDILab) in the Computer Science Engineering Department at the University of Texas at Arlington. In this article, I will explain what problems we are solving at HDILab. In Human Data Interaction Lab, we are studying artificial general intelligence (AGI). Many students already have an idea about what artificial intelligence (AI) is. But artificial general intelligence or AGI might be a new term.
